TopicTitle: Cómo se añade una pieza nueva al satélite?

Articles.Content:
Hola

Estoy intentando hacer una misión que se llama "añade una pieza nueva al satélite ...", ya que es del juego original entiendo que no necesito un mod para completarla, sin embargo cuando me acerco al satélite con el ingeniero y con la pieza en el inventario (una batería) no me deja realizar ninguna acción. Hice una misión de reparar una antena y ningún problema, imagino que esto se hará diferente, pero ni idea.  Igual es una tontería pero ya no sé qué más probar, agradecería cualquier información al respecto.

 Muchas gracias

[Moderator added translation]

Hello

I'm trying to do a mission called "add a new part to the satellite...", since it's from the original game I understand that I don't need a mod to complete it, however when I approach the satellite with the engineer and the part in the inventory (a battery) won't let me perform any action. I did a mission to repair an antenna and no problem, I imagine this will be done differently, but I have no idea. It's still nonsense but I don't know what else to try anymore, I would appreciate any information about it.

 Thank you

Edited January 21, 2023 by James Kerman
Added Translation
You need to have the engineer get very close to the satellite. Then attach the battery using the construction menu. There is a crane hook on right side of your screen for this.

Hello 

That's it, thank you very much for the answer!
